AA: I liked the look and feel of the game
CH: The game was not too easy and not too hard to play
EC: It was easy to know how to perform actions in the game
GR: The goals of the game were clear to me
PF: The game gave clear feedback on my progress towards the goals
AUT: I felt free to play the game in my own way
CUR: I wanted to explore how the game evolved
IMM: I was fully focused on the game
MAS: I felt I was good at playing this game
MEA: Playing the game was meaningful to me
ENJ: I had a good time playing this game
